Bash(echo "# Commands to run on miniPC (192.168.71.2):

# Check Coder service status
sudo systemctl status coder

# Stop Coder service
sudo systemctl stop coder

# Clear any remaining Docker containers/networks
sudo docker system prune -f

# Start Coder service
sudo systemctl start coder

# Verify it''s running
sudo systemctl status coder

# Check logs if needed
sudo journalctl -u coder -f")

Bash(echo "# Commands to fix the port conflict on miniPC:

# Check what''s using port 7080
sudo netstat -tulpn | grep 7080
# or
sudo lsof -i :7080

# If it''s another Coder process, kill it:
sudo pkill -f coder

# Check if there are any Coder processes still running
ps aux | grep coder

# Try starting Coder again
sudo systemctl start coder

# Check status
sudo systemctl status coder")
